data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Nevsehir a passion to plant another simple church.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nevsehir, Turkey

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Nevsehir, Turkey to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary: On average, 17 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Nevsehir, Turkey.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Nevsehir access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Over 99.4 percent of the people of Nevsehir are far from Jesus.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab, Syrian people.
Father, help the 107 believers in Nevsehir to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Nevsehir, Turkey to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Nevsehir prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

location.name: Nevsehir
location.people_groups_list: Abaza, Gajal, Gadzhal, Hemshin, Kurd, Kurmanji, Herki
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Abaza (14,000), Gajal, Gadzhal (18,000), Hemshin (22,000), Kurd, Kurmanji (2,200), Herki (43,000)
